channel.title: Choropleth map per regions
channel.description: I find it a pity that the Choropleth map feature in Redash only allows us to mark countries. It's not possible to show the differences for smaller areas but our customers mainly come from only one country.

item.title: Choropleth map per regions
item.dc:creator: dribble
item.description:
Is it possible to add support US/Counties to this map?

Read full topic

item.title: Choropleth map per regions
item.dc:creator: levko
item.description:
We already have on open PR for this feature (https://github.com/getredash/redash/pull/4599). You can subscribe for updates to know when it becomes available.

Read full topic

item.title: Choropleth map per regions
item.dc:creator: Vas
item.description:
Found this thread and wanted to say this one would be really important for us. We need to create visualizations of signup counts per NUTS1/NUTS2/NUTS3 of a variety of European countries and our current data is visualized with Redash so we’re wondering how to achieve that now

Read full topic

item.title: Choropleth map per regions
item.dc:creator: MathieuBossaert
item.description:
hi @levko ! this is a promising inprovment. Get geojson from database would be great too…

Read full topic

item.title: Choropleth map per regions
item.dc:creator: levko
item.description:
Very soon I’ll start working on migrating Choropleth visualization to React, and by the way I plan to implement a feature that will allow to use arbitrary GeoJSON (loaded from external source) in visualization. I think it will cover all cases like this one.

Read full topic

item.title: Choropleth map per regions
item.dc:creator: chrismerck
item.description:
There’s already support in the Coropleth map viz for multiple types:

I may very well consider submitting a PR for adding USA/States and USA/Counties as built-in options. @jesse does that sound like a likely-mergeable PR, or is this frozen by the React migration?

Read full topic

item.title: Choropleth map per regions
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Yes, the choropleth needs some improvement. We’d like to make it easier for the community to contribute visualizations. This will be easier once the React migration is complete.

Read full topic

item.title: Choropleth map per regions
item.dc:creator: mipu
item.description:
I find it a pity that the Choropleth map feature in Redash only allows us to mark countries. It’s not possible to show the differences for smaller areas but our customers mainly come from only one country.

Read full topic
